install.requete: CREATE TABLE `a_mod_blog_billets` ( `id_billet` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `titre_billet` varchar(150) NOT NULL default '', `billet` text NOT NULL, `auteur` varchar(30) NOT NULL default '', `date_redaction` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date_parution` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `nbre_coms` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `nbre_vues` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `id_cat` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `tags` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_billet`), FULLTEXT KEY `tags` (`tags`), FULLTEXT KEY `billet` (`billet`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `a_mod_blog_cats` ( `id_cat` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `module` varchar(30) NOT NULL default 'blog', `titre_cat` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `image_cat` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `nbre_billets` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `ordre` int(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '999', PRIMARY KEY (`id_cat`), KEY `module` (`module`,`titre_cat`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `a_mod_blog_coms` ( `id_com` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_billet` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `msg` text NOT NULL, `email` varchar(100) default NULL, `pseudo` varchar(30) default NULL, `site` varchar(250) default NULL, `prevenu` binary(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id_com`), FULLTEXT KEY `msg` (`msg`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
